Package gil.common

Interface Summary
ICurrentTime  
IInvokeable<V>  
IProgressEventListener The interface to be implemented by listeners to receive a notification when progress changes in an async operation.
 

Class Summary
AsyncResult<V> Used to monitor the progress of a asynchronous operation and provide the results when the operation is done.
ByteBufferFormatter Creats a readable string of the content in a ByteBuffer.
ConfigFile Parses a xml configuration file with the following format: appSetting is mandatory.
CurrentTime A wrapper around System.currentTimeMillis() to make it possible to stub out calls for test purposes.
FrequencySubdivider Used to subdivide frame changes in one system (system 1) to frame changes in in a system with a lower operating frequency (system 2).
GILConfiguration This is a convenient class to read and validate all GIL application settings.
Helpers Generic helpers.
Invoker Aggreagates a queue of commands to be executed on a separate thread from the thread where they have been scheduled.
Parameters This class is a wrapper around a key-value set of parameters, supplying getters that validates parameters depending on their data type.
ProgressChangedEventArgs Provides data for a progressChanged event.
Result Encapsulates a success or failure indication.
Timeout Encapsulates a start time and a timeout.
Trigger<T> Use this class to detect state changes on variables of arbitrary data type.
ValueResult<T> Encapsulates the object given by the generic type together with a boolean result code for success or failure.
XMLHelpers Generic helpers for XML DOM processing.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidFileFormatException Exception class used to indicate file format violations.
InvalidParameterException Exception class used to indicate invalid parameters on operation calls.
ProtocolViolationException Exception class to be thrown when there is a violation to a communication protocol rule.
